    • getDishesByCategory

      public List<Dish> getDishesByCategory(String category) throws DBException

      Parameters:
      category - category by which it filters dishes from menu
      Returns:
      list of dishes of a certain category

      DBException - if any SQLException was caught

    • sortBy

      public List<Dish> sortBy(List<Dish> dishes, String sortBy)
      Sorts list of dishes by a chosen sorting method.
      Parameters:
      dishes - list of dishes that needs to be sorted
      sortBy - sorting method
      Returns:
      list of sorted dishes
      See Also:

    • getDishesOnePage

      public List<Dish> getDishesOnePage(int offset, int noOfRecords)
      Creates a database query for a list of dishes that will be displayed on a specific page. There can be no more than 10 dishes per page.
      Parameters:
      offset - how many records to skip from the database
      noOfRecords - how many records on 1 page
      Returns:
      a sublist of the given list of dishes
      See Also:
      • DishDAO.newViewAllDishForChange(int, int)
